mapper.select: SELECT corp_name,corp_id,type FROM corps WHERE corp_id=#{corp_id}
SELECT DISTINCT community_name,community_id FROM community WHERE corp_id = #{corp_id}

SELECT ps.parking_num, ps.license_plate_number, house.house_num, house.owner_name, ps.gender,ps.car_owner_tel,ps.car_owner_standby_tel FROM parking_space ps LEFT JOIN house ON house.house_id = ps.house_id AND house.community_id = ps.community_id WHERE ps.parking_num = #{parking_num} AND ps.community_id = #{community_id}

SELECT * FROM parking_space ps LEFT JOIN parking_pay_statistics pps ON ps.parking_space_id = pps.parking_space_id WHERE ps.parking_num = #{parking_num} AND ps.community_id = #{community_id} AND pps.year = #{year}
